main event: A sighting of a round, white object the size of a grapefruit was reported on 13 Feb 58, with no sound and no visible trail.
interesting points: The object was observed for 5 minutes, It had a grapefruit shape and coloration, No noise was reported during the sighting, The object was described as possibly being a weather balloon, The report was marked for high priority review.
sighted object: round white object the size of a grapefruit
